entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
